content: materials drops safran or muskat from garnstudio each cuddly toy weighs less than 50 g use remains and choose the colors you wish see pictures for suggestions drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c for safran or 3 5 mm/e for muskat accessories poly stuffing for filling **pattern links** dutch version 1 norwegian version 2 swedish version 3 french version 4 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/dk/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=31&lang=dk 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=31&lang=no 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=31&lang=se 4 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=31
